FuncDef: This command specifies which scheduling classes map to the low burst limit threshold of an egress HS primary shaper. The HS primary shaper is used to manage aggregate bandwidth of the subscriber with multiple SLA profile instances (expanded SLA mode).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the highest scheduling class that is associated with the low burst limit threshold of the HS primary shaper. Scheduling classes that are higher than the scheduling class ID are associated with the high burst limit threshold. Values-1 to 6.
